TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WorkflowViewStateService extends System.Activities.Presentation.View.ViewStateService

Docs.summary: Manages the view state of the activity designer and its underlying model items.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Implements <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.View.ViewStateService> and generates a text property that stores and retrieves its value from an associated control's view state.
